problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,∠A=90°,BC=2cm,分别以B、C为圆心的两个等圆外切,则这两个圆中阴影扇形的面积之和为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, ∠A = N_0, BC = N_1, circumscribe two equal circles with B and C as the centers respectively, then the sum of the areas of the shadow sectors in these two circles is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵△ABC中,∠A=90°,BC=2cm,∴两个扇形的圆心心的和是90°,半径是1,则阴影部分的面积是:\frac{90π}{360}=\frac{π}{4}cm²．故选:B．
